Suit trousers in a stretch weave with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Diagonal side pockets, jetted back pockets with a button, and legs with creases. Super skinny fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.

Suit trousers in dogtooth-patterned fabric with an extended waistband with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side pockets and welt back pockets with a button. Slim fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.

Shorts in imitation leather with a regular waist, face pockets and a visible zip at the front. Lined.

Parka in a sturdy weave with a drawstring hood with a fleece lining at the front. Zip and wind flap with a hook-and-loop fastening at the front, handwarmer pockets and patch pockets with a flap and hook-and-loop fastening. Adjustable tab with a hook-and-loop fastening at the cuffs and sides and a drawstring at the hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.

Long, padded bomber jacket with a detachable, lined hood with a faux fur trim. Zip down the front, flap side pockets with a press-stud, a zipped pocket on one sleeve, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Scratch mittens in soft organic cotton jersey with ribbed cuffs. No thumbs.
Short shorts in a linen and cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and lace details at the hems. Unlined.
